story.text: Walter aims to uncover the hidden gem that is Federated Wiki.

Walter believes he is on planet earth to reduce suffering by focusing his efforts within the tension between: love and survival; socialism and capitalism; empathy and selfishness; liberalism and tribalism; urban and rural. Still reading? Read more about his [[philosophy]].

item.text: Walter aims to uncover the hidden gem that is Federated Wiki and guide it to global adoption.
